Description:
Assist in project planning activities, including defining project scope, objectives, deliverables, and success criteria.
Support project managers in developing project plans, timelines, milestones, and resource allocation.
Monitor project performance, track progress, and identify potential risks and issues.
Maintain project documentation, including project charters, schedules, status reports, and change requests.
Implement and maintain project management tools, templates, and processes to ensure consistency and efficiency in project execution.
Provide guidance and support to project managers in applying project management methodologies and best practices.
Conduct quality assurance reviews to ensure adherence to project management standards and compliance with organizational policies.
Assist in resource management activities, including resource allocation, capacity planning, and resource forecasting.
Support the development and implementation of project management training programs for project managers and stakeholders.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to facilitate effective communication, collaboration, and alignment throughout the project lifecycle.
Assist in post-project evaluations to identify lessons learned and contribute to continuous improvement efforts within the PMO.Skills
